# message

**Instance Property**

A short description of how to use the tip’s feature.

## Declaration

```swift
var message: Text? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `Optional` and defaults to a value of `nil`.

## Setting tip content

- **title**: A title that names the tip.
- **image**: The image associated with the tip.
- **id**: The tip’s unique identifier.

items.description: A title that names the tip.
items.name: title

items.description: The image associated with the tip.
items.name: image

title: message
